129770131.review:
One of a kind Cantonese voice acted visual novel. Give it a try, especially if you understand Cantonese and likes visual novels. Apparently an English translation will be coming soon.

Pros:
- Plot revolves around a conspiracy within a town, where different routes take your experience to different perspectives of the parties involved with that conspiracy. I would say it is pretty well done, and very immersive. 
- Adventure themed visual novel, as opposed to dating sim themed. Therefore, entire story is not fueled by romance.
- Great Hong Kong drama style humor + anime reference humor, especially if you understand Cantonese.
- Well-written characters. Tracys is my favorite character. Hope she is more focused-on in the sequel.
- Unique artsyle.
- Amazing Cantonese voice acting.
- [spoiler] 百合万岁!!! [/spoiler]

Cons:
- Some dialogue options does not makes sense, e.g.: an event happens after selecting option A, but the same event does not happen after option B when logically it should happen due to forces you shouldn't be able to control. But I suppose that's a pretty common visual novel flaw.
- There is a fast-forward button, but no "skip to next dialogue option" button. But for whatever reason there is a "skip to previous dialogue option" button. This makes collectibles time consuming to collect.
- It is not a story that wraps everything up; there are obvious loose ends that will probably be addressed in a future yet unannounced sequel game. Because they are currently working on a new IP (Noctuary), there is no confirmation for a sequel.
- No English translation (yet, but I heard it is coming soon based on the Kickstarter they did).

TLDR; unique visual novel experience if you understand Cantonese, 9/10.
Even if you dont understand Cantonese, the plot is good enough that it deserves a try. (whenever the EN translation is here)

120418951.review: Good AVG. The story is humorous and interesting.

119464987.review:
[h1]Wow, that was a brilliant experience![/h1] 

It's a real pity that this masterpiece is still left untranslated after almost a year since its release - because I'm positive once this VN reaches a broader audience, it will get its rightful place among the top tier novels of all times!

'Cause it has everything it needs for that:

- well-developed and charismatic characters
- a detailed and interesting world
- a very convoluted and intriguing story
- a good sense of humor

The steampunk, "end of 19 century"-like setting with a few anachronistic elements added for fun (like idols or cosplay, for example) is definitely not something that you happen upon often in the visual novels :D And the Cantonese voiceover adds even more to the unique atmosphere and style of the game.

I would recommend to buy it even if you don't speak Chinese at all - when the translation gets released, you won't regret it!

116415449.review: Ive been wanted to see an anime styled storytelling game. Can't say this game met my expectations but definitely not disappointed. 7.5/10

116165356.review:
少见的优秀中文+粤语VN （超级推荐）

完整的故事，颇具野心的世界观，如《杀手》般同一事件多角度的叙事手法，出色的人物设计，精美的插图，耐听的音乐。一个优秀的VN作品该有的要素这个作品都有，再加上不算太贵的价钱，绝对的物有所值，只要是会读中文和会听粤语的VN爱好者就绝对不能错过。就可惜这部作品并没有太多人宣传。

作品很好，但还是有那么一点点遗憾的地方。比如有些普通结局处理得有些草率，稍微欠缺打磨，角色立绘有些重复，CG有些少，过场和结束动画有些简陋，游戏系统有待进步。但这些也不过是鸡蛋里挑骨头罢了，毕竟这个价钱真的不贵，相当值得。

超级期待第二期的，如果有的话，毕竟这么庞大且精致的世界观不出个第二，三，四+期的话超级可惜的，况且还是难得的中文粤语作品，希望大家能给予支持与鼓励给开发组，毕竟我是真的还想看到更多关于科尔赛斯与其它大陆的冒险故事！

98185895.review:
从来没玩过这么上瘾的视觉小说

以往玩过的视觉小说就是看看故事，但这个不知道是因为粤语配音的关系，还是本顺剧情紧凑，一直让我想知道接下来要发生什么事情。剧情很好的融合了严肃和搞笑，音乐也十分应景。

配音有些许瑕疵，比如配音和文本不完全一致，那个斯诺米诺语也有点出戏，不过绝大部分的配音都很给力，有种“对味儿”的感觉

十分推荐一玩

P.S. 柯罗莎的傻笑太可爱了

97786698.review: It’s refreshing to see a Cantonese dubbed game on the market especially one that has excellent voice acting in addition to it’s vast amount of dialogue. The game itself has multiple storylines and endings, the choices made by the player profoundly affects the fate of the MC. The story’s well paced and provides a good chunk of content. The characters and CG are drawn superbly. Overall a interesting game, very enjoyable to play.
